rcp26.description: RCP2.6 (Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6) is a low-emission scenario aimed at limiting global warming to well below 2 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels. It involves stringent greenhouse gas reduction measures and represents a future where immediate actions are taken to stabilize atmospheric concentrations and mitigate severe climate change impacts.

rcp85.description: RCP8.5 (Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5) is a high-emission scenario where greenhouse gas emissions continue to rise, resulting in substantial global warming and potentially severe climate change consequences.
